title: How to Draw Cartoon Angel Wings

steps.headline: Draw two circles, about an inch apart.
steps.description:
Note, that whatever you do to one circle, do the exact same to the other. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/e\/e3\/Draw-Angel-Wings-Base-Step-1.jpg","bigUrl":"\/images\/thumb\/e\/e3\/Draw-Angel-Wings-Base-Step-1.jpg\/v4-270px-Draw-Angel-Wings-Base-Step-1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":172,"bigWidth":"270","bigHeight":"101","licensing":"

License: Creative Commons<\/a>
\n<\/p>


\n<\/p><\/div>"}

steps.headline: At the top left corner(circle 1) / top right corner(circle 2) of the circles, draw a large oval, pointed northeast(2)/west(1).
Below it, draw smaller ovals, overlapping a bit, pointed slightly lower than the top ovals.
Basically repeat step 3, though make the ovals a bit smaller than the ones before.
Draw the final ovals, smaller than the ones above, and should be pointing southeast(2)/west(1)
Add a small circle on the top right corner (1) and top left corner (2) of the circle base.
steps.description:
Directly below it, draw a small square. These are the joints and ends of the wing's bones. {"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/4\/4f\/Draw-Angel-Wings-Joints-Step-6.jpg","bigUrl":"\/images\/thumb\/4\/4f\/Draw-Angel-Wings-Joints-Step-6.jpg\/v4-270px-Draw-Angel-Wings-Joints-Step-6.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":172,"bigWidth":"270","bigHeight":"101","licensing":"

License: Creative Commons<\/a>
\n<\/p>


\n<\/p><\/div>"}

steps.headline: Outline in black, erasing the sketch afterwards.
Colour in the picture, adding a bit more highlights, than shadows to give it a more holy, lighter feel to it.

text:
Draw two circles, about an inch apart. Note, that whatever you do to one circle, do the exact same to the other. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/e/e3/Draw-Angel-Wings-Base-Step-1.jpg","bigUrl":"/images/thumb/e/e3/Draw-Angel-Wings-Base-Step-1.jpg/v4-270px-Draw-Angel-Wings-Base-Step-1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":172,"bigWidth":"270","bigHeight":"101","licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} At the top left corner(circle 1) / top right corner(circle 2) of the circles, draw a large oval, pointed northeast(2)/west(1). {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/9/94/Draw-Angel-Wings-First-Feather-Step-2.jpg","bigUrl":"/images/thumb/9/94/Draw-Angel-Wings-First-Feather-Step-2.jpg/v4-270px-Draw-Angel-Wings-First-Feather-Step-2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":172,"bigWidth":"270","bigHeight":"101","licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Below it, draw smaller ovals, overlapping a bit, pointed slightly lower than the top ovals. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/4/4e/Draw-Angel-Wings-Second-Feather-Step-3.jpg","bigUrl":"/images/thumb/4/4e/Draw-Angel-Wings-Second-Feather-Step-3.jpg/v4-270px-Draw-Angel-Wings-Second-Feather-Step-3.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":172,"bigWidth":"270","bigHeight":"101","licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Basically repeat step 3, though make the ovals a bit smaller than the ones before. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/8/81/Draw-Angel-Wings-Third-Feather-Step-4.jpg","bigUrl":"/images/thumb/8/81/Draw-Angel-Wings-Third-Feather-Step-4.jpg/v4-270px-Draw-Angel-Wings-Third-Feather-Step-4.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":172,"bigWidth":"270","bigHeight":"101","licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Draw the final ovals, smaller than the ones above, and should be pointing southeast(2)/west(1) Add a small circle on the top right corner (1) and top left corner (2) of the circle base. Directly below it, draw a small square. These are the joints and ends of the wing's bones. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/4/4f/Draw-Angel-Wings-Joints-Step-6.jpg","bigUrl":"/images/thumb/4/4f/Draw-Angel-Wings-Joints-Step-6.jpg/v4-270px-Draw-Angel-Wings-Joints-Step-6.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":172,"bigWidth":"270","bigHeight":"101","licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Outline in black, erasing the sketch afterwards. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/9/95/Draw-Angel-Wings-Outline-Step-7.jpg","bigUrl":"/images/thumb/9/95/Draw-Angel-Wings-Outline-Step-7.jpg/v4-270px-Draw-Angel-Wings-Outline-Step-7.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":172,"bigWidth":"270","bigHeight":"101","licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Colour in the picture, adding a bit more highlights, than shadows to give it a more holy, lighter feel to it. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/b/be/Draw-Angel-Wings-Colour-Step-8.jpg","bigUrl":"/images/thumb/b/be/Draw-Angel-Wings-Colour-Step-8.jpg/v4-270px-Draw-Angel-Wings-Colour-Step-8.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":172,"bigWidth":"270","bigHeight":"101","licensing":"
